ui.storeDescription: Browse curated modules, fragments, and templates designed for fast binary delivery.
ui.loginDescription: Access your workspace, release controls, and deployment history.
ui.featureUnavailableDescription: Enable the feature in site config to expose this route.

fragment://page/home/hero@v1.heading: h1
fragment://page/home/hero@v1.title: Binary-first. Fragment-native. Zero hydration.
fragment://page/home/hero@v1.description: The render tree is the artifact. HTML is a fallback. Every surface is compiled into deterministic binary fragments for replay, caching, and instant patching.

fragment://page/home/planner@v1.heading: h2
fragment://page/home/planner@v1.title: Planner executes before rendering.
fragment://page/home/planner@v1.description: Dependency resolution, cache hit checks, and runtime selection happen up front. Rendering only occurs on cache miss; revalidation runs asynchronously.

fragment://page/home/ledger@v1.heading: h2
fragment://page/home/ledger@v1.title: Hot-path fragments rendered by WASM.
fragment://page/home/ledger@v1.description: Critical transforms run inside WebAssembly for deterministic, edge-safe execution. Numeric outputs feed fragment composition without touching HTML.

fragment://page/home/island@v1.heading: h2
fragment://page/home/island@v1.title: Isolated client islands stay sandboxed.
fragment://page/home/island@v1.description: Preact loads only inside the island boundary. No shared state, no routing ownership, no global hydration.

fragment://page/home/react@v1.heading: h2
fragment://page/home/react@v1.title: React stays server-only.
fragment://page/home/react@v1.description: React fragments compile into binary trees without client hydration. The DOM remains owned by Qwik.

fragment://page/home/dock@v1.heading: h2
fragment://page/home/dock@v1.title: Server-only dock fragment.
fragment://page/home/dock@v1.description: MagicUI dock authored in React, compiled to a static fragment.

fragment://page/store/stream@v1.heading: h2
fragment://page/store/stream@v1.title: Realtime store feed.
fragment://page/store/stream@v1.description: Postgres stays the source of truth while Valkey Search ranks results; updates stream in as items change.

fragment://page/store/create@v1.heading: h2
fragment://page/store/create@v1.title: Create a new store item.
fragment://page/store/create@v1.description: Write to Postgres, validate with drizzle-zod, and stream updates into the feed.

lab.title: Lab
lab.description: Prototype new fragment systems, run experiments, and validate edge behaviors.

steps.label: Cache check
steps.hint: Cache hit map built before rendering.

wasmRenderer.title: WASM transform demo
wasmRenderer.subtitle: Deterministic WebAssembly outputs drive fragment composition without touching HTML.

notes.fragment: Outputs feed layout metrics, not HTML.

stages.label: React fragment
stages.hint: React fragment renders on the server only.

stages.label: Binary tree
stages.hint: Compiled into a binary stream without hydration.

stages.label: Qwik DOM
stages.hint: Qwik owns the DOM and applies the tree.

fragments.Validated by drizzle-zod and streamed ov: Validated by drizzle-zod and streamed over realtime updates.
Name must be at least 2 characters.
Price must be a non-negative number.
